description: From translingual Cordyceps, a genus of fungus from certain species of which the compound was formerly extracted,  +â€Ž -in.

entries.meaning: (biochemistry, organic chemistry) A deoxy form of adenosine.
examples: The results with cordycepin are less clear-cut. With cordycepin, low levels cause considerable inhibition of mRNA synthesis with little effect on embryo growth, suggesting that new mRNA may not be a requirement for early growth.
